as a trump supporter i already have a low amount of brain cells and opening this app has made it so much worse. i was already incapable of thinking for myself, doing research, believing science, etc. because of this app i have also become racist, mysoginistic, homophobic, and a dumbass. this is unacceptable. the cheeto is ruining our lives by putting this app into the internet please delete it immediately
-karen smith

attributes.review: i have grownup within a liberal family, meaning we don‚Äôt normally support republican political views. with that being said, it was without question we already had our mind made up about trump, at least the rest of my family did. i decided i wanted to inform myself about the republican side, and i came to really understanding, and almost supporting their ideas. i went all around social media, specifically twitter, facebook, and tiktok, seeing how everyone views our president. and that is when i found out about the trump 2020 app. i thought, oh well, what‚Äôs wrong with supporting MY president... thats when it started. i have a fairly new phone, so i didn‚Äôt expect for it to take as long as it did to download. i started to have a stomach ache, i thought it may have been caused by my dairy allergy, so i ignored it. once the app downloaded, i was actually asleep. when i woke up, i was terrified. my skin was slowly tanning... but not the natural, glowy roman tan i normally get in the summer, it was quite orange. the bloating started with my fingers, which normally with my binge eating, it goes straight to my stomach and thighs, so i knew it had to be something else. the stomach ache was still there, only it had gotten worse. my arms became the size of a body builder, only instead of muscle it was fat. my stomach starting bulging out of my shirt and pants. i saw myself in the mirror for only a slit second, and my whole body tripled in size... not in length, but in width. the only part of my body that was a normal color was my scalp, everything else had turned orange. the stomach ache a gotten so bad, i couldn‚Äôt even hold my internal sewage in my ripped up pants. it was everywhere, practically tearing out my insides. for a second, i had thought i was giving birth through my ass, only to remember i am a 40 year old virgin. i looked down and couldn‚Äôt see past my wide-reaching gut. surrounding my (what i think where my feet) was a immense pile of orange diarrhea. what the heck was happening to me?? im swimming in a pile of my own fecal matter! that‚Äôs when i remembered... the trump app! i swam threw the doo doo to my phone, even swallowing my own erectile feces. i tryed to delete the app, but my phone had exploded. my booty hole was the size of a chihuahua. i blacked out after that, only to wake up with a foggy vision. i wasn‚Äôt able to feel anything, only my face had felt a little chilly. i couldn‚Äôt even move my head. i started to scream, only for what looked like some doctors had ran into the room. they comforted me, only to tell me my body had almost exploded due to what ever was coming outside of my body. my head had to be cut off in order for my survival. i was a floating head inside of a jar with gucky matter that kept me alive. my head is currently connected to wires which translates my thoughts into a machine, which is how i am wrighting this review. please, for your own safety, don‚Äôt download the app... or you may become a severed head like me.
